verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Thou supreme O Jesus Christ Nor creed - nor form - nor word Nor holy Church - nor human love Compare with Thee my Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Thou supreme O Jesus Christ Thy love has conquered me Beneath Thy Cross I die to self And live alone to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Thou supreme O Jesus Christ My inmost being fill So shall I think as Thou dost think And will as Thou dost will{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Thou supreme O Jesus Christ Thy life transfigure mine And through this veil of mortal flesh Lord let Thy splendor shine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be Thou supreme O Jesus Christ My soul exults in Thee To be Thy slave - to do Thy will Is my felicity{/lang-eng}
